author: Dave George
text:
Hello, my question is three part. Thank you again for helping in Northern California. 
What legal guidelines must we know while marketing a new service to the community as a public service agency if the service will compete with private service?
What legal guidelines as they relate to marketing, must we know when visiting hospitals, Skilled nursing facilities or Board and Care facilities regarding the new service?
What legal requirements or restrictions apply to a marketing plan in terms of wording, content, printed material and suggested methods for the fire department to utilize?
Thank you very much.
title: Fire Department Marketing guidelines
